channel.title: CVE Feed for Sound Exchange -- libsox
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sound Exchange -- libsox

item.title: CVE-2021-40426|2024-08-04T02:44:10.379Z -- sound%20exchange -- libsox
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the sphere.c start_read() functionality of Sound Exchange libsox 14.4.2 and master commit 42b3557e. A specially-crafted file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
